recommendations: Abhishek Kundalia ‚ÄúRitik was one of my direct mentees during the 2019 summer internship at ZestMoney. Ritik had been very collaborative, an enthusiastic team member who worked with his partner intern to present deliverables in a timely, organized fashion. Ritik showed humility in accepting suggestions for changes, improvements and worked to provide a high-quality presentation and a working proof-of-concept on Go-lang. Ritik had been proactive and self-driven to solve problems and achieve results. Additionally, Ritik had worked on Android and ML projects and had picked up in no time. I have no hesitation in recommending Ritik for any software development engineer role. +1 for a positive and never giving up attitude.‚Äù

Nidhi Chincholikar ‚ÄúRitik worked as a software development intern at Zestmoney. He did projects in different technologies like Go Lang, Python, Android and Java, while proving that technology is no barrier to him. In a short span he also picked up projects on Machine Learning and created an impact. He is a self driven individual and a very quick learner. I would like to recommend Ritik Gupta for his exceptional technical skills and learning potential.‚Äù
